content:
# I successfully crafted 1 Electronic Circuit, and my inventory now reflects this addition along with the updated counts of other materials.
# The inventory now shows 4 Iron Plates, 15 Copper Plates, and 1 Copper Cable remaining.

# With the Electronic Circuit crafted, I can now consider what to do next. 
# I could craft more advanced items or set up additional machinery to enhance my production capabilities.

# One potential next step is to craft an Assembling Machine, which requires:
# - 1 Electronic Circuit
# - 9 Iron Plates
# - 3 Copper Plates

# First, I need to check if I have enough Iron Plates and Copper Plates to craft the Assembling Machine.
iron_plates_needed = 9
copper_plates_needed = 3

# Check available resources
if iron_plates_available >= iron_plates_needed and inspect_inventory()[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= copper_plates_needed:
    # Proceed to craft the Assembling Machine
    craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, quantity=1)  # Crafting 1 Assembling Machine.
else:
    print("Not enough resources to craft the Assembling Machine.")  # Not enough resources for crafting.

# After attempting to craft the Assembling Machine, I will check my inventory again.
print(f"Inventory after attempting to craft Assembling Machine: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after crafting attempt.
